Variants.Description: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Positive_Control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Negative_Control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Experiment_Methods.Statistical_Analysis_Method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold_for_Normal_Readout.Value: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold_for_Abnormal_Readout.Value: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
